description.narrative: By 2022, capacities of formal and informal service providers enhanced to provide equitable, quality and coordinated child-friendly justice services, to girls and boys and their families

mailing-address.narrative: 4-8 Rangoon Close Ward 24 P.O. Box 5051 Cantoments Accra

sector.narrative: Access to child-friendly police and justice sector services
Justice sector workforce strengthening and capacity building (including police)

title.narrative: Ghana United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Ghana Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Child Protection)
Ghana Country Programme Document 2012-2016 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2018 Ghana: Summative Evaluation of Ghana’s Child Protection System Strengthening at District Level
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2022, capacities of formal and informal service providers enhanced to provide equitable, quality and coordinated child-friendly justice services, to girls and boys and their families

description.narrative: In 2019, an additional 2,330 police personnel (female 847, men 1483) especially those working with domestic violence and victims support unit were trained to handle the cases of children including the cases of forced and child marriage. Since 2016, a total of 12,526 police personnel (out of a total of 32,000) have received training under this initiative. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Percentage of justice professionals that have been certified in and dealing with: (a) child offenders; and (b) child victims
Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms

baseline.value: Currently in place are the SOPs for police on child offenders, victims and witnesses

target.value: 2022:Guidelines/Training manuals for judiciary, probation officers, evidence of the application of the SOPs

actual.value: 2020:Operational Manual and CF-GBV Courts manual is printed
